task.name: tasks.CreateThenOperate
task.description: For an agent to move toward an planned system (decontamination site, road block etc.), create it and then, operate it. The object won't be created and build if agent doesn't have the physical capability or if it hasn't enough resources to do it

parameter.name: plannedWork
parameter.description: The plannified system (planned object) to create and operate.

parameter.name: removeWork
parameter.description: Define if planned work that is beeing operated needs to be destroyed at the end of the task.
